Notes

This entry is for the original 2013 first pressing release, cut by [a=Chab (2)], identifiable by "Chab.☆" etchings appearing in all runouts, and side D runout without a "-30372-" stamp. Not to be confused with: [r=9216088] (2013 repress), which contains the additional "-30372-" stamped in the side D runout. [r=31621720] (2017 reissue), which does not contain the additional "-30372-" on the second record, and lacquer cut by "GOPHER" on the first record. Or later reissues with 'DREAM BEYOND DREAMS' in the runouts: [r=10790424] (2017, lacquer cut by 'GOPHER') [r=19570846] (2017, lacquer cut by 'GOPHER') [r=17432941] (2021, lacquer cut by 'Ben. S & MPƵ') Release date: Continental Europe and Ireland: 17 May 2013; UK: 20 May 2013; USA: 21 May 2013. Issued in gatefold jacket with 8-page 12" × 12" booklet containing detailed credits and complete lyrics to each track. Includes a voucher for downloading the album in MP3, 320 kbps. Sealed copies have a hype sticker on the front: Feat. [m=546596] & [m=594096] Daft Punk 180 gram double vinyl Also includes digital download. 88883716861 Catalog number 88883 71686 1 on back cover, label rimtext. Catalog number 88883716861 on spine, labels, booklet. Columbia and Sony Music logos on back cover. Columbia only on spine, labels.
